## ICopyable.isCopyable() method

Whether this instance is currently copyable. The standard implementation is to return true if isOwnDeletable and isOwnMovable return true.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isCopyable?(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

True if it can currently be copied.
